topic.fullpath: Topic :: System :: OS distribution :: Live CD

name: GaurabSUSE
short_description: GaurabSUSE-KDE  can be run as a livecd as well as installer using the live installer; can also be used as a rescue os; contains deafult kernel, and a lot of software to do all of one’s everyday tasks. Based on the robust OpenSUSE13.1 this customized distribution “GaurabSUSE-KDE” is what one must give a try, and if you like it and/or have any comments/suggestions please feel free to contact me at- “gban.1911@gmail.com”. Your feedback is highly appreciated and in future i will be providing 64bit versions as well as server versions.
